alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:06AM AKST until February 04 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 50 below occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...On the Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight Thursday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chill as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
